channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Graffiti on wall in Padfield Road, 18th January
item.description:
3 instances bof graffiti down wall - Soul Is India, Soul Warbuton and LOL as shown in photos. Please can these be removed. Put there over the weekend, thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201, Coldharbour Lane, Loughborough Junction, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 18th January
item.description:
Upper Holly Hill Road DA17 6HJ completely littered with glass bottles , rubbish, electronic cables ,and more. The whole road is covered in rubbish as the pupils from Bexley collage ( Holly Hill) are littering road constantly, this issue is ongoing for so long. Please send someone to pick up rubbish not the sweeping car as it won’t be able to clean ( cars are parked on the road) . Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Holly Hill Road, Northumberland Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Manhole cover, 18th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmstead Lane, Elmstead, Greater London

item.title: Street lights not working with correct times, 18th January
item.description:

item.title: Large pot hole on the road near pavement, 17th January
item.description:
I'm a residents living at 26 West street. When a car passes over the pot hole it splashes water all over of my front house and window. I have a new born baby and it is very difficult to push the buggy out of my house. This is very serious & dangerous for the residents because the street is very narrow and i noticed some cars go very fast & don't realise this large pot holes out side my house. This could cause a serious accident for the public and residents. This pot hole only appeared around a week ago or since the cold weather recently. I would be greatful if you could come and fix this pot hole as soon as possible. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): West Street, Blendon, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
